00047   void testScrollingPanelLogicalSize(){ 
00048     int w=10;
00049     int h=12;
00050     this->m_caption->setLogicalSize(w, h);
00051 
00052     int w2=this->m_caption->getLogicalWidth();
00053     int h2=this->m_caption->getLogicalHeight();
00054  
00055     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( w==w2 && h==h2 );
00056   }

00094   void testScrollingPanelGoDown(){
00095     this->m_caption->setLogicalHeight(40);
00096     this->m_caption->setPhysicalHeight(20);
00097     int y=8;
00098     this->m_caption->setYOffset(y);
00099     this->m_caption->goDown();
00100     int y2=this->m_caption->getYOffset();
00101     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( y2==++y );
00102   }
00103 
00104   void testScrollingPanelGoUp(){
00105     this->m_caption->setLogicalHeight(40);
00106     this->m_caption->setPhysicalHeight(20);
00107     int y=16;
00108     this->m_caption->setYOffset(y);
00109     this->m_caption->goUp();
00110     int y2=this->m_caption->getYOffset();
00111     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( y2==--y );
00112   }
